Name: Workout very active for skinny person

Video.title: Day 1 - Push day - Chest, Shoulders, and Triceps
Video.content: Bench Press (12,10,8) Incline Bench Press (12,10,8) Flys (20,15,12) Crossovers (20,15,12) Military Press (12,10,8) Lateral Raises (12,10,8) Reverse Flys (12,10,10) Skull Crushers (15,12,10) Tricep Extensions (15,12,10) Kickbacks (15,12,10)

section.title: Eat calorie-dense foods
section.content: The calorie-dense foods doesn’t refer to the fried and processed foods that people eat due to good taste. Several healthy-calorie dense foods are loaded with healthy fats, vitamins, proteins, & other nutrients. If you want to turn your skinny body into a curvy one, you need to include these foods in your diet. Some examples of calorie-dense foods include meats, fishes, nuts, eggs, etc. All these foods help in filling your body with healthy calories that can be converted into good fats.

section.title: Drink calories
section.content: To put on weight, you can always prepare calorie-filled drinks & smoothies at home. For most of us, drinking is much easier and convenient than eating healthy foods. Thus, you can use high-calorie fruits & vegetables to prepare smoothies at home. To add more calories, you can use seeds & nuts as a topping. This will help you to consume high amounts of calories without compromising your health. Also, these homemade healthy smoothies are much better than processed & packed health drinks.

section.title: Meats
section.content: Meats are an amazing source of protein, iron, healthy fats, vitamins, and zinc, etc. These are great for building muscles & putting on weight. Moreover, these are one of the healthiest calorie-rich foods in the world. By including these in your diet, you can easily gain weight & get into your desired body shape. Some examples of the best meats for weight gain include red meat, chicken, pork, etc. If you are looking to build more of a muscular body, then go for lean meats.

section.title: Fatty fishes
section.content: Fatty fishes are loaded with healthy fats & calories to help you gain weight quickly. Apart from these, fatty fishes are an excellent source of proteins, omega-3s, minerals, vitamins, and fiber. By including these in your diet, you can easily increase your caloric-intake to a huge amount. Moreover, these fishes are a very healthy option to gain weight along with many other health benefits. Some examples of fatty fishes include salmon, mackerel, tuna, herring, etc.

section.title: Nuts
section.content: Nuts are an excellent snack to boost your caloric-intake by a great amount. Nuts are loaded with healthy fats i.e. omega-3 & omega-6, which are effective for weight gain. Furthermore, nuts contain proteins, minerals, dietary fibers, and proteins. Consuming a few nuts can easily contain hundreds of calories, which is really good for putting on weight. The best thing about nuts is that they can be eaten as a snack or as a topping on your favorite dishes.

section.title: Eat 5-6 times a day
section.content: to put on weight quickly, you need to eat 5-6 meals a day. When you eat 5-6 times, you are naturally going to eat lesser food. But you can always add extra calories to every meal to boost your weight gain process. For this purpose, you can add nuts & seeds as a topping on your food. Moreover, you can add other healthy nutrients to each of your meals to keep yourself healthy.

section.title: Avoid low-calorie diet
section.content: Most of the people around the world tend to eat foods that have low-calorie count. These might include popcorns, starchy carbohydrates, fruits, and vegetables, etc. As the calorie count of these foods is low, you cannot gain weight easily. Thus, you need to replace these with high-calorie healthy foods. These foods include butter, cheese, nuts, eggs, and full-fat dairy products, etc.

Video.title: Day 2 - Pull Day - Back and Biceps
Video.content: Lat Pulldowns (12,10,8) Dumbbell Rows (12,10,8) Pullovers (12,10,8) Dumbbell Curls (15,12,10,8)

These might include popcorns, starchy carbohydrates, fruits, and vegetables, etc. As the calorie count of these foods is low, you cannot gain weight easily. Thus, you need to replace these with high-calorie healthy foods. These foods include butter, cheese, nuts, eggs, and full-fat dairy products, etc.

Video.title: Day 3: Cardio. Some options include Cardio Endurance Workout and 30-Minute Interval Workout
Video.content: Workout 1 - Steady State Cardio Choose any activity you like—running, walking, cycling, or any cardio machine and work at a moderate intensity for 20 or more minutes. Workout 2 - Lower Body Training After a steady cardio workout, your legs should feel fresh and ready to go for this lower body workout. This routine includes four circuits, each with three different exercises for the lower body. Do one exercise after the other for each circuit, rest and then repeat.

section.title: Eat calorie-dense foods
section.content: The calorie-dense foods doesn’t refer to the fried and processed foods that people eat due to good taste. Several healthy-calorie dense foods are loaded with healthy fats, vitamins, proteins, & other nutrients. If you want to turn your skinny body into a curvy one, you need to include these foods in your diet. Some examples of calorie-dense foods include meats, fishes, nuts, eggs, etc. All these foods help in filling your body with healthy calories that can be converted into good fats.

section.title: Drink calories
section.content: To put on weight, you can always prepare calorie-filled drinks & smoothies at home. For most of us, drinking is much easier and convenient than eating healthy foods. Thus, you can use high-calorie fruits & vegetables to prepare smoothies at home. To add more calories, you can use seeds & nuts as a topping. This will help you to consume high amounts of calories without compromising your health. Also, these homemade healthy smoothies are much better than processed & packed health drinks.

section.title: Meats
section.content: Meats are an amazing source of protein, iron, healthy fats, vitamins, and zinc, etc. These are great for building muscles & putting on weight. Moreover, these are one of the healthiest calorie-rich foods in the world. By including these in your diet, you can easily gain weight & get into your desired body shape. Some examples of the best meats for weight gain include red meat, chicken, pork, etc. If you are looking to build more of a muscular body, then go for lean meats.

section.title: Fatty fishes
section.content: Fatty fishes are loaded with healthy fats & calories to help you gain weight quickly. Apart from these, fatty fishes are an excellent source of proteins, omega-3s, minerals, vitamins, and fiber. By including these in your diet, you can easily increase your caloric-intake to a huge amount. Moreover, these fishes are a very healthy option to gain weight along with many other health benefits. Some examples of fatty fishes include salmon, mackerel, tuna, herring, etc.

section.title: Nuts
section.content: Nuts are an excellent snack to boost your caloric-intake by a great amount. Nuts are loaded with healthy fats i.e. omega-3 & omega-6, which are effective for weight gain. Furthermore, nuts contain proteins, minerals, dietary fibers, and proteins. Consuming a few nuts can easily contain hundreds of calories, which is really good for putting on weight. The best thing about nuts is that they can be eaten as a snack or as a topping on your favorite dishes.

Video.title: Day 4: Workout 1 - a.m. Lower Body Superset Workout and workout 2 - p.m. Upper Body Supersets
Video.content: This advanced lower body workout uses supersets with compound exercises that focus on the quadriceps, hamstrings, and gluteal muscles. Almost all of the supersets also include a plyometric exercise. So not only will you build muscle and improve strength, but you'll also torch calories, and train your body for more explosive and responsive movements—such as jumping, sprinting, or quick directional changes used in sports like soccer, football, and basketball.

The best thing about nuts is that they can be eaten as a snack or as a topping on your favorite dishes.

section.title: Eat 5-6 times a day
section.content: to put on weight quickly, you need to eat 5-6 meals a day. When you eat 5-6 times, you are naturally going to eat lesser food. But you can always add extra calories to every meal to boost your weight gain process. For this purpose, you can add nuts & seeds as a topping on your food. Moreover, you can add other healthy nutrients to each of your meals to keep yourself healthy.

section.title: Avoid low-calorie diet
section.content: Most of the people around the world tend to eat foods that have low-calorie count. These might include popcorns, starchy carbohydrates, fruits, and vegetables, etc. As the calorie count of these foods is low, you cannot gain weight easily. Thus, you need to replace these with high-calorie healthy foods. These foods include butter, cheese, nuts, eggs, and full-fat dairy products, etc.
